bt.torrent

Interface TorrentSession

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTorrentSession, StubSession

    public interface TorrentSession
    Torrent processing session.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TorrentSessionState getState() 
      Torrent getTorrent()
      Returns torrent, that this session is processing.
      TorrentId getTorrentId()
      Returns torrent ID, that this session is processing.

    • Method Detail

      • getTorrent

        Torrent getTorrent()
        Returns torrent, that this session is processing. Note that in some cases (e.g. when using magnet links) the torrent may be absent in the beginning. In such case this method will return a fake Torrent object, containing reasonable "stub" values (falses, zeroes, empty collections).
        Returns:
        Torrent, that this session is processing, or a fake Torrent object, if the torrent hasn't been fetched yet
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getTorrentId()

      • getTorrentId

        TorrentId getTorrentId()
        Returns torrent ID, that this session is processing. Note that in some cases (e.g. when using magnet links) the torrent itself may be absent in the beginning. Use BtRuntime.service(Class) to get a TorrentRegistry and then use TorrentRegistry.getTorrent(TorrentId) that returns an Optional
        Returns:
        Torrent ID, that this session is processing
        Since:
        1.3
        See Also:
        TorrentRegistry, BtRuntime.service(Class)

      • getState

        TorrentSessionState getState()
        Returns:
        Current state of torrent processing session
        Since:
        1.0
